transformations.name: CodeValues
transformations.description: Removing columns not used in mapping

transformations.name: CodeTypes
transformations.description: Remove columns not used in mapping

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		capital_code as string,
		account_number as long,
		capital_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OmMapCodeValues
source(output(
		capital_code as string,
		account_number as long,
		capital_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OmMapCodeType
FilteredCodeValues select(mapColumn(
		code2,
		map_code_type_id,
		source_code_key,
		source_system,
		om_x_ref,
		target_long_descr,
		target_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CodeValues
FilterCodeTypeID select(mapColumn(
		map_code_type_id,
		map_code_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CodeTypes
CodeValues, CodeTypes join(CodeValues@map_code_type_id == CodeTypes@map_code_type_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCodeTypeAndValues
JoinCodeTypeAndValues derive(source_code_key = case(source_system =='PARIS' && contains([122,173], #item == CodeValues@map_code_type_id),source_code_key,source_code_key)) ~> DerivedSourceCodeKey
OmMapCodeType filter(contains([329, 106,122,113,50,45,124,367,219,374,151,167, 101, 100, 180, 108, 107,    
370,117,112,466, 136,179,404, 157, 148, 391,127,116, 464,384,161, 198 ,109,771,770,
774,775,773,772,776,777,127,169,170,460,785,787,788,791,786,792,794,123,793,795,797,
798,796,800,801,368,802,803,804,806,807,407,809,811,812,813,816,827,828], #item == map_code_type_id)) ~> FilterCodeTypeID
DerivedSourceCodeKey select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key,
		source_system,
		target_code,
		target_description = target_long_descr,
		code_type = map_code_type,
		code_type_id = CodeValues@map_code_type_id,
		code2,
		om_x_ref
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTcrossReference
SelectTcrossReference aggregate(groupBy(source_code_key,
		source_system,
		target_code,
		target_description,
		code_type_id,
		code2,
		om_x_ref),
	code_type = first(code_type)) ~> Deduplicate
OmMapCodeValues filter(!contains([source_code_field1,source_code_field2,source_code_field3,source_code_field4],#item=='created_by')) ~> FilteredCodeValues
Deduplicate sink(input(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		code_type_id,
		code2,
		target_description,
		source_system,
		om_x_ref,
		target_code,
		code_type,
		source_code_key
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tCrossReference
